features: Portable Folding Design: The hangers are lightweight and foldable for easy storage and transportation.
Anti-Slip Features: The hangers have a textured surface to prevent clothes from slipping off.
Slim and Space-Saving: The compact size saves space in luggage and dorm rooms.
Durable Plastic Construction: The hangers are made from sturdy plastic that can support up to 10 pounds.
Multi-Purpose Use: The hangers can be used for travel, dorm room organization, and laundry drying.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Advantages of Trubetter folding hangers These hangers are foldable and portable. You could easily to fold it up into a very compact shape and pack it to your bag but would not take of a lot of room. Trubetter folding hangers make of superior ABS material which is light weight. There is fixed with a tiny stainless steel screws on the hanger that makes it more sturdy to hold the clothes. The Non-slip design will keep your clothes stay in the place, won’t be fall down and stretch out.

Compact for Easy Storage These hangers can be folded thus it can fit in small pockets of travel bags and luggage. With a slim, compact profile that helps to conserve precious space in your closet. Space-saving and no hassle at all. Package include : 12pcs black hangers Really Smart and Practical It’s for baby’s clothes when it’s half unfolded, while it’s for adult’s clothes when it’s fully unfolded.Clothes can be held firmly by the design of anti-skid grooves. Dimensions of Folding hanger Folding size, Length 5.3’’ x Height 2.95’’ ; Full size, Length 16.7’’ x Height 6.69’’ .Each hanger weighs 33 grams thus very convenient to carry around either for travelling, hiking, camping or even for home-use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific for cruise!
reviews.reviewText: Update Mar 2020: These went along on our spring break cruise this year (yes, we were the LAST passengers on our ship before all cruises were halted due to COVID!) and they were terrific. So worth bringing along! They will be going camping with us this summer as the campsite we're staying at has a pool and the kids will be swimming, I'm sure!I don't like to schlep extra stuff and I've always gotten by with the number of hangers in the cruise cabin closet by hanging things on top of other things. (Plus if there aren't many I know I can ask for more.) But I was swayed to try these by the idea of drying swim suits and the fact that you could "trap" the straps and they wouldn't blow off the hanger! I brought them on our cruise and am so glad I spared the luggage space for these!Pros:~ Super light-weight and fold down small~ They were really sturdy - I hung a pretty heavy sweater on one and it was fine~ Work really well for adult and children's clothes~ You can "trap" straps in them for drying, even in the wind!Cons:~ ??? I'm not sure - I loved them!Wish I'd have taken a picture of our swim suits drying on our balcony - we just hooked the hanger over the back of our chairs and they stayed put. (I had an elastic clothes line with clips on our last cruise that I really liked but we packed it away for the winter in our boat so didn't have access to it. I was in a bit of a panic but realized I could use these. I'm glad - these gave the flexibility of extra hangers in the closet AND drying things on the balcony or in the bathroom so they'd be my choice over the heavier clothesline with built in clips for future travel.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for traveling around Europe and am so glad I did - they came in handy on multiple occasions! Especially after washing clothes and hanging a few items to dry. The places we stayed only would have a few hangers if any, and I wear dresses mostly so it was great to be able to hang them up. They’re also nice and sturdy and unfold to a good size. I might even use them as regular hangers when not traveling! (This was in the spring/summer - not sure how they’d fare with heavier items but probably fine).Highly recommend! Only drawback is they take up a little bit of space, not too much but probably more than other options out there because these are sturdier. They’re still pretty light, fold up well and are definitely worth it! I’m taking them with me on future travels for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, great for travel.
reviews.reviewText: These were perfect for a recent vacation. I love that they fold up. Our closet had an odd angle that wouldn’t fit a standard hanger, so I was forced to use these in the folded position and they fit perfectly. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 12 PCS Black Travel Hangers
reviews.reviewText: Lovely concept for travelling and a great amount of hangers included. However I returned these after I found some more aesthetically appealing ones instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Traveler's Dream
reviews.reviewText: Why hadn't I bought these long ago? They are light, collapsible and useful. TBH I 'm not certain they would support a heavy winter coat but they were fine for suit jackets. Just fold them up and throw them in your suitcase until you reach your destination. Good price. Good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel hangers
reviews.reviewText: These are the most useful hanger for a travel. Since I bought them I have been using them over and over in hotel, airbnb, and family homes. Small enough to just little space in your suitcase and sturdy enough to hand all king of clothing. It’s one of my best buying in Amazon. Totally recommend it. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for travel. Lightweight and easy to use. Would have loved to have had an option to purchase half the amount but I can always use them in the house. It was great to hang up the shirt I was planning to wear the next day and also a wet jacket to dry. Now I just need a small pouch to make it easy to grab when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I only go on vacation to tropical places thus very warm weather with me sweating a lot and changing my shirts a lot. No matter how many hangers I get in my room I need more so I looked up travel hangers, saw these and ordered them asap. They are everything I wanted. First I wanted them to work but take up little space. All 12 of these fold up and can slide easily into any zippered pocket with a carry on with no issue of possibly being damaged and shockingly take up so little space. They open up to the size of an ideal hanger. yes they are slightly fragile but that is to be expected with them also being made for size. Be careful with them and they will indeed be sturdy and durable. I gently place a shirt on a hanger heavy with sweat and the hanger works perfectly. I think they could handle heavier winter clothes as well as long as you are careful when placing the item on. I am thrilled with these and now I have 12 extra hangers on every trip I go on. Beyond thrilled and highly recommend.
Able to hang cruise wardrobe successfully

Bought these for a cruise. They were small and compact and barely took up any room or weight in my luggage. They were strong enough to hold my clothes as well as my husband suit jackets. So glad I bought them!

I was so happy to find these for travelling. The hotels are always so limited on hangers. This is a very compact hanger easy to pack in the luggage. They are lightweight, strong and sturdy. Would purchase again.
Très pratique en voyageSolides et compact pour le transport
